org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.xquery
Class AeXQueryStaticVariableResolver

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.xquery.AeXQueryStaticVariableResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sf.saxon.variables.VariableResolver
public class AeXQueryStaticVariableResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sf.saxon.variables.VariableResolver

An implementation of an XQuery variable resolver. This implementation resolves all variables to simple 'no-op' variables that are used only for analysis (not execution).

          Default c'tor.
